title.narrative: Introduction to Protection Mainstreaming Training and Action Planning

description.narrative:
April: Introductory training and familiarisation for management and staff of CTP and partners - A 2-3 days interactive training curriculum designed to introduce PM key concepts and the joint PM framework and approach. - Short session (2 hours) sensitization with senior managers if they are unable attend the training. - It will include a session on self-rating of the framework and action planning. If key-decision makers are unable to attend the training, those attending the training should follow-up afterwards to get buy-in and the required sign-off. - Specific MandE tools that have been developed to measure progress against the PM Action Plans and to assess how protection is mainstreamed protection in programmes will be introduced.
June support visit (2 weeks) - Accompaniment to Trocaire staff and Caritas Rumbek in Yirol. In depth sessions on a couple of core components e.g. Mapping and Referrals, Feedback and Complaints mechanisms
September (1-2 weeks) - to be decided depending on progress and gaps identified. Possibly a TOT, focus on monitoring and evaluating PM
